website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line cream that’s effective in getting rid of stretch marks.
pros: Thick consistency spreads and absorbs well
Subtle scent won’t bother those sensitive to smells
Effective in making stretch marks less noticeable, even if they’ve been there a while
cons: Some feel it’s overpriced for the amount you get

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. First off, I purchased this product a week ago and its already gone. I should have read thoroughly before purchasing (shame on me). I would have never paid so much for a tiny amount of product, however it's still a complete RIP off! Not to mention it did absolutely nothing for my stretch marks. I really wish I could get my money back. Buyers BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cream, i just started using it after giving ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cream, i just started using it after giving birth and i can already see the stretch marks starting to disappear. On my previous pregnancies i used all kinds of creams and nothing really worked, so needless to say i was pretty skeptical at using this cream at first. But after i started to see results this quick i was completely amazed and was so happy to find this. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Saguit Hazan

customer_reviews.title: Not right for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to cure stubborn stretch marks and was willing to pay for a premium product. I didn't see any noticeable results with daily usage. Also, I was disappointed in the small size. I tried to conserve the cream as long as possible but it ran out in about three weeks. It doesn't have a smell which some people are looking for. They send you a lot of emails to follow up on your purchase so seemingly good customer service. Looking back, I would go with a cheaper alternative. In my case, it didn't work but it may do well for those who have a different skin composition.
customer_reviews.author: JBravo7

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 1 and been using it for about a month and i am so happy, i will ordere more containers and will continue ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is the real deal !!!!!After trying all these various types of stretch mark cream and losing hope that I'd ever be able to get rid of them or at least lighten them this product actually worked! I ordered 1 and been using it for about a month and i am so happy , i will ordere more containers and will continue to use it until I get the results I want. It takes a week or so before you notice a difference, but as long as you apply it as recommended it is so worth it! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Eynat

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: This stretch mark creme works great! I experienced stretch marks in each of my pregnancies and looked for a solution to reduce their appearance on my skin. I found this wonderful product with natural ingredients recently. I applied the creme on the areas of my stomach and thighs and noticed smoother skin and a decrease in the appearance of my stretch marks. I only wish it came in a bigger bottle because I ran out after two and a half weeks. With continued use, I know I can diminish the appearance of my stretch marks even more which would give me more body confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Connie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I’ve struggled with stretch marks throughout my life, it’s been hard to keep stretch marks away while gaining and losing weight periodically but, I can say this product is doing the job well. I haven’t been using the cream for too long but, after two weeks I’ve seen results, my stretch marks are becoming lighter and fading. I love that the cream feels more like a lotion than a greasy feeling. It has a nice pleasant smell. I would definitely recommend Deux Derme cream to anyone struggling with stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results in weeks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cream is amazing! During my pregnancy with my baby I developed stretch marks on my mid section. And I was looking for a good solution. When I bought this cream i was a bit sceptical. But this cream has really changed my life it has smoothed the skin and reduced stretch marks in just a few weeks! I recommend to all!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have bought this product for my daughter twice. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for my daughter twice. She had a C-section and has had surgery in her stomach area. She loves this product and says it has definitely made a difference in the appearance of her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E.

customer_reviews.title: Not 30 day supply
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and I have seen a little bit of a difference. I am giving it 4 stars because the product doesn't last 30 days. I use it like it says morning and evening and just one pump of it and honestly on my second tiny very expensive (1oz) jar and it only last about 2 weeks. Buyer be aware that it's not a 30day or Plus days product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of your stretch marks!
customer_reviews.text: I still have several stretch marks on my body, especially thighs and breasts from when I was a teen from fast muscle growth. I’ve been using this product for a month now, once a day. The moisturizing cream is helping to eliminate the marks and keep my skin looking amazing! The cream smells good and is soft. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to diminish the appearance of their stretch marks!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Stretch Mark Cream
customer_reviews.text: I got this cream for my stretch marks. It feels luxurious, smells great, and has a pretty nifty dispenser. I use it every day, and I really hope it will help the stretch marks disappear.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rosenblatt

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: my wife went thru a pregnancy with no stretch marks at all
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I can tell this product is working, but I wish there were more in this little bottle. In order to see max results must use as intended on bottle
customer_reviews.author: Danny Girl

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so shocked it actually worked! I didn't use it consistently. Sometimes I would forget sometimes I was just too lazy, but I definitely notice my stretch marks have faded so much! Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: this was quicker than I thought and better than I’ve imagined
customer_reviews.text: Give this cream a month and you’ll see the marks fading!!!! Seriously, this was quicker than I thought and better than I’ve imagined. Also smells nice and texture is cool😊
customer_reviews.author: asaf&mor

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This cream did not work for fading my stretch marks at all.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes but doesn't treat stretch marks. I used this cream as instructed for 6 months and haven't noticed a difference in my stretch marks. Save your money and buy bio oil instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: ... the beginning I was skeptical but after reading the good reviews I decided to give it a try and ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cream over a month and I have to say that at the beginning I was skeptical but after reading the good reviews I decided to give it a try and I’m so happy for that!!!! It’s reduced my stretch marks and I feel that the more I use the better it works!! The price not so cheap- but you get the results of what you pay!! I like it and I think it’s a fair deal
customer_reviews.author: Or eliav

customer_reviews.title: Just started using. Nice, light scent.
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this product. We’ll see how it goes! The cream has a nice, light and fresh scent (not too strong). Also has an interesting push down top that the cream comes out of - so I’m not sure what happens when the cream gets low inside the container. Although, it has a twist off top as well so you can always just get the cream out that way.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: there are better AND more affordable products out there
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't purchase again, there are better AND more affordable products out there.
customer_reviews.author: HFM15

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using this product for a bit over a ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a bit over a month and began noticing changes. It is not a miracle but the stretch marks have diminished in color and brightness
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product religiously and have seen no difference. Very expensive for it to not work or even smell good.
customer_reviews.author: BB423

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a significant improvement after a week of using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: packaging was good
customer_reviews.text: I am going to try this again for longer and see if it works any better and update accordingly. The customer service is really good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roy

customer_reviews.title: It's a small container but if you apply it twice ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a small container but if you apply it twice a day and massage the cream on the stretch marks twice a day you'll see noticeable reductions. It's expensive for only a small amount, but since it's working, I'm willing to pay for it. I will absolutely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Amin

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED this! It feels amazing on my skin and ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this! It feels amazing on my skin and really diminishes the appearance of my stretch marks. I also have really sensitive skin and this didn't give me any reaction whatsoever which was definitely a plus for me. I would 10/10 recommend this for anyone interested in reducing the appearance of stretch marks!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps with itchy belly.
customer_reviews.text: The only cream that helped with my extremely itchy belly in the 3rd trimester. I will come back in 3 months to add if it really helps with stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: ELENA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product for 3 wks and have seen amazing results! I've had stretches from puberty that were stubborn. This product has practically erased them I can barely see them. I can only imagine what results I will see in 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cream is AMAZING! I started to use this product about half ...
customer_reviews.text: This cream is AMAZING! I started to use this product about half way through my pregnancy and fell in love immediately. This is better than other stretch mark creams I have used, keeps the belly hydrated all day. It worked so great!!! No stretch marks. I will use this again if i have another baby, for sure
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This cream is a little more expensive; however it is working extremely well for my problems areas! It smells good and you can actually feel it working! If you follow the directions and be patience, it works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for weightlifting marks
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my trainer. This is stuff seriously works. All of my prior stretch marks from lifting all these years are almost gone. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stretch mark product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different stretch mark creams over the years, and this is by FAR my favorite purchase! It smells good, feels good, AND works! Not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger bottle and cheaper
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is small and I don’t see a difference yet

customer_reviews.title: For as big as the packaging is, not a ...
customer_reviews.text: For as big as the packaging is, not a lot comes in it. I can't say how well it works because I only got a few weeks worth of use out of it and you're supposed to use it for three months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I paid over $50 for this and it lasted maybe a week and I saw no results! Do not waste your money !!! If iCloud give it no stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all.... what a waste of money... I was hopeful but was sadly disappointed.... and you get maybe 10 uses out of it.... not enough in the bottle for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Martinez

customer_reviews.title: 1oz really?!!!
customer_reviews.text: Too little product for the price... I haven't seen results and will not be buying because it's too expensive to be buying on a biweekly basis.
customer_reviews.author: Hortensia Spradling

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the results!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product once in the morning and once at night, and after a week I already noticed a difference!

customer_reviews.title: Super expensive for the amount you get
customer_reviews.text: Super expensive for the amount you get, iys supposed to be for a month its more for 2 weeks. Not worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Despite daily usage, did not see a difference. Would not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: This is a waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This is a waste of time and money.... I started use this two times a day and I didn't notice any changes, also is so expensive and no to much product on it.... VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cream twice a day for 2 weeks with no results. I understand that 2 weeks isn't a long time, but the cream is already gone! I do NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hill

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with this product. I have been using this stretch mark cream for a little over a week and I can already feel and see the difference. The cream smells great which is definitely a plus for me but the best part is that after two pregnancies my stretch marks are actually fading. Something I thought would never happen. Can’t wait to see how they fade in weeks to come!
customer_reviews.author: CKelley93Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered from stretch marks for as long as I can remember. I'd basically given up and figured nothing could be done. A friend told me about Deux Derme after a magazine article she read where is was on some top editor list... I decided to try it. I started ones daily and began to see pretty good results. When I stated using twice daily though it really worked... after a couple of months I couldn't be happier! Will recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: ohad garnon

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the smell.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is working yet. I don't like the smell and I could sometimes smell it through my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No differences in my stretchies
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a month, as directed, twice a day. I have not seen any differences in my stretch marks. Mine are lighter in color since they are older and they are still just as visible as they were before I started using this product. Another issue I have is the container does not work as it should. I tried several times to get the lotion out by pushing down the top and it will not work so I have to unscrew the lid. I am a little disappointed since all the other reviews has awesome results.
customer_reviews.author: karey vogel

customer_reviews.title: Great cream! I like the pump so my fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cream! I like the pump so my fingers don't contaminate the rest of the cream. It also keeps antioxidants preserved. Goes on smooth and absorbs quickly. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Only giving three stars because it only lasted a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Only giving three stars because it only lasted a week. I did see small results though, but for this price I need something to at least last a month.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Worked for My Stretch Marks
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the product for 3 months now after reading about it in a magazine. One of my friends highly recommended it. I have stretch marks from 10 years ago that are completely gone, and the rest have faded dramatically. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jake Dadon

customer_reviews.title: Cream that actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product since I had my first child, I got very unlucky with the marks on my skin. This cream seems to actually be helping and removing stretch marks, not sure how it works.. but very cool

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to use it! First need to figure out the packaging

customer_reviews.title: I can have more babies!
customer_reviews.text: Now that I know I can take care of these awful stretch marks from my last pregnancy, I'm ready to have more babies! The marks are almost already completely gone. I was so unhappy and depressed that these would be with me forever....So happy with the end result!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing

customer_reviews.text: I love this cream. This is my second jar, I've been using it for several weeks now and I'm madly inlove with it. My skin feels and looks better, smoother and softer. The texture is smooth, it smells nice and fresh and it really feels like its working. I'm a fan!

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I got stretch marks from weight lifting and I tried this cream to help lighten the marks at least, but I didn't see a noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Deux Derme - Stretch Mark Intensive removal Cream With Vitamin E, Shea, Cocoa Butter for Pregnancy, Weight Gain
feature_bullets: LOVE YOUR SKIN – Stretch Marks aren’t something you have to learn to live with. Whether you’re pregnant, experiencing weight gain or love bodybuilding, stretch marks happen. Don’t let life take away your confidence. Deux Derme’s Stretch Mark Intensive Cream is packed with more than 18 good-for-you ingredients that moisturize, revitalize, and diminish the appearance of stretch marks to help you feel better in the skin you’re in.

SCIENTIFICALLY FORMULATED, HAPPY CUSTOMER VALIDATED – Stop getting your hopes up with creams that make big promises and then fall short on delivery. Deux Derme’s proprietary formula for men and women relies on the best of science and nature to literally fade the appearance of stretch marks with regular use.

SAFE FOR YOU, SAFE FOR YOUR BABY – Life’s greatest miracles tend to come with some less than desirable consequences. Luckily, with Deux Derme stretch marks don’t have to be one of those. We crafted our pregnancy-friendly cream to be free of Parabens, Phthalates, Formaldehyde, Hydroquinone, DEA, DHA, Benzoyl Peroxide, SLS, Retinols, Salicylic Acid, and Benzoyl Peroxide, so it’s safe for you and your little one during and post pregnancy.

INGREDIENTS MATTER – Did you know that most stretch mark solutions use water as the first ingredient? At Deux Derme we never dilute our Cruelty-Free and Vegan formulas. Instead, we fill our maximum strength stretch mark concentrate to the brim with active naturals including Peptides, Plant Stem Cell Extracts, Resveratrol, Vitamin E, Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Vitamin C, and the list goes on. Discover the Deux Derme difference.

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – Purchase with complete peace of mind. If you decide Deux Derme isn’t the stretch mark cream for you (though we highly doubt it), we’ll happily refund your money. After all, your satisfaction is our top priority.
